{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = tp-link C1200 front.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/Archer-C1200.html |sp = https://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/Archer-C1200_V1/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_Archer_C1200_v1.x |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer C1200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |model_part_num = |revision = v1.x |subrevision = (EU/US) |wlclass = AC1200 |series = Archer C1200 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7C1200 |icid = 8853A-C1200 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2050500719 <!-- 15122225-3.0 --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM47189B0; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 900 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B1G1646G-BCH9; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53125S; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 50:C7:BF |oui = 50:C7:BF
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pad header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_XXXX,TP-LINK_XXXX_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Proware |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/31/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833704312 |asin = B01IUDUJE0 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43217T; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"15122225-3.0 Rev.1.0sp3" or similar is silkscreened on the board :''C1200(US) Ver:1.0'' in the [https://fccid.io/TE7C1200/Internal-Photos/Archer-C1200-Internal-Photograph-2016-08-31-3117781 FCC photos] (2x USB 2.0 ports).
*"2050500719" and "1629" is silkscreened on the board :''C1200(EU) Ver:1.0'' in the photos (1x USB 2.0 port).
Web GUI: http://tplinkwifi.net
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/review-tp-link-archer-c1200 ''TP-Link Archer C1200'' review on '''DigitalCitizen''']
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:tp-link C1200 front.jpg|front File:tp-link C1200 back.jpg|back </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:tp-link C1200 board.jpg|PCB C1200(EU) Ver:1.0 File:tp-link C1200 soc BCM41789B0.jpg|CPU File:tp-link C1200 rom winbond 25q128fvsg.jpg|Flash, Serial File:tp-link c1200 ram Samsung k4b1g16465 8ch9.jpg|RAM File:tp-link C1200 wifi 2,4 BCM43217.jpg|WLAN 2.4GHz File:tp-link C1200 switch BCM53125.jpg|Switch </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==Notes== ===Power adapter=== :''[[TP-LINK]]'' '''T120100-2C1''' *12V DC / 1A (Hardware V1.0, EU Version) *12V DC / 2A (Hardware V1.0, US Version) *12V DC / 1A (Hardware V2, EU Version) *12V DC / 1.5A (Hardware V2, US Version) *12V DC / 1A (Hardware V3, US Version)
